<< numel Elementary functions pinv >>

permute

Permute array dimensions.

Syntax

R = permute(A, order)

Input argument

A

an array.

order

Dimension order: row vector

Output argument

R

result array rearranged with new dimension order.

Description

permute permutes the dimensions of an array.

Example

x = [1 2 3; 4 5 6]
y = permute(x,[3 1 2])

See also

ipermute, reshape, transpose.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
